original: unfold UpwardsClosedSeparationAlgebra. intros worlds R J. intros Hup1 Hup2 m1 m2 m3 m4 Hjoin1 Hjoin2 Hle1 Hle2. unfold upwards_closed_Kdenote. intros x Hx y Hy. apply Hup1 with (m2 := m2) (m1 := m1) (m3 := m3) (m4 := m4); auto. intros x Hx y Hy. apply Hup2 with (m1 := m1) (m2 := m2) (m3 := m3) (m4 := m4); auto.
